wikipedia_page.main: Richard Lewis Martell, also known as "Rich Martell" or "Dicky M" (born 10 February 1989), is an Internet entrepreneur best known for founding Floxx Media Group, orderswift, being the creator of FitFinder and business expert on the television series Million Dollar Intern.

response: Floxx was founded in January 2011 shortly after Rich Martell left University College London following the fallout of his viral student website, FitFinder. Late in 2010, Floxx received a £100,000 seed investment from UK Dragons Den investor Doug Richard and Silicon Valley's Kevin Wall. At the time of its launch, the company was based around the so-called Silicon Roundabout but moved to allow for expansion in 2012. In 2014, Floxx opened an office in Covent Garden, London.
